featured.text: Diapers are _(23)_ used by astronauts when they are outside the space shuttle, wearing a spacesuit.

definition.zh_def: 宇航服：宇航員在太空中穿著的特殊服裝，用於保護他們免受極端環境的影響。
definition.en_def: A spacesuit is a specialized garment worn by astronauts to protect them from the harsh conditions of outer space.
definition.example: The astronaut put on his spacesuit before stepping out of the spacecraft.
